forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. North wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
This evening in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a canopy of partly cloudy skies, with the air carrying a slight chill as temperatures settle around 49 degrees. A gentle north wind whispers through the streets, hinting at the clarity the night promises, although the horizon might occasionally brush with the shadows of fog. The beauty of the cityscape, punctuated by twinkling lights, offers a serene backdrop to a quiet night, inviting contemplative strolls along the waterfront or cozy gatherings at local cafes.

As Monday dawns, expect a shift towards vibrant sunshine that bathes the city in warmth by midday, reaching a high near the comfortable 63 degrees. The northwest breeze will carry the fresh scent of the bay, softening the edges of the day. With the heart of the city glowing in daylight, it would be wise to layer up in light clothing for the morning chill, transitioning into lighter fare as the sun ascends. Take the opportunity to leisurely explore the streets, perhaps indulging in a quiet moment at one of the many parks or enjoying a stroll through the bustling markets, letting the spirit of the day guide you into local discoveries.
